mapper.select: select 'MO' || lpad(mos_seq.NEXTVAL,3,'0') as o_no FROM dual

SELECT a.mo_no , b.d_name , a.doc_id , a.o_dname , a.o_cla , a.o_target , to_char(a.o_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')as o_regdate , a.o_caution , a.o_result , a.del_yn , a.o_title , a.o_noti FROM my_order a , doctor b WHERE b.d_id = a.doc_id AND A.mo_no = #{moNo}
select a.m_no, c.p_name, c.p_sex, a.m_name ,a.d_name, a.m_date from medi_reco a , my_order b , patient c where a.m_no = b.m_no and a.p_no = c.p_no and b.mo_no = #{moNo}
